.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ListItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager

public ref class ListItemCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type ListItemCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IList interface IStateManager

summary.span: 列表控件中的 对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects in a list control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 对象的集合。The class represents a collection of objects. 对象，反过来，表示项显示在列表控件，例如。The objects, in turn, represent the items displayed in list controls, such as the . 若要以编程方式检索对象从一个列表控件，使用以下方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a list control, use one of following methods: - 使用索引器获取单个从使用数组表示法的集合。Use the indexer to get a single from the collection, using array notation. - 使用方法复制到集合中的内容对象，然后可用于从集合中获取项。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection to a object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. - 使用方法来创建实现的对象，然后可用于从集合中获取项。Use the method to create a implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. - 使用`foreach`(C#) 或`For Each`(Visual Basic)，循环访问集合。Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. 属性集合中指定的项总数和通常用于确定集合中的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 可以添加和从集合中移除项，通过使用和方法。You can add and remove items from the collection by using the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象，将项添加到集合，并从集合中删除项。The following code example demonstrates creating objects, adding items to the collections, and removing items from the collections. 在示例中，名为`listBoxData`用作数据源控件调用`ListBox1`，并调用`ddBoxData`用作数据源控件调用`DropDownList1`.In the example, the named `listBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `ListBox1`, and the called `ddBoxData` is used as the data source for a control called `DropDownList1`. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListItemCollectionSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollectionSample/CS/listitemcollection2cs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListItemCollectionSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollectionSample/VB/listitemcollection2vb.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以在集合中搜索与属性等于指定文本`text`参数。Use the method to search the collection for a with a property that equals text specified by the `text` parameter. 此方法执行区分大小写，不区分区域性的比较。This method performs a case-sensitive and culture-insensitive comparison. 此方法不会执行部分搜索项或通配符搜索。This method does not do partial searches or wildcard searches. 如果使用此条件的集合中找不到项`null`返回。If an item is not found in the collection using this criteria, `null` is returned. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ListItemCollection_Search#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollection_Search/CS/listitemcollection_search.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[ListItemCollection_Search#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItemCollection_Search/VB/listitemcollection_search.vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来删除集合中的对象。Use the method to remove a object from the collection. 该方法的此实现创建对象使用中的文本`item`参数，并删除这集合中。This implementation of the method creates a object using the text in the `item` parameter and then removes this from the collection. 指定`item`参数必须与匹配属性的现有对象或没有任何项从集合中移除。The specified `item` parameter must match the property of an existing object, or no item is removed from the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的类。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 网页包含具有一些列表项控件和一个控件命名为`Delete`。The Web page contains a control with some list items in it and a control named `Delete`. 用户输入到删除的项的文本控件。The user enters the text of the item to delete into the control. 事件处理程序`Button1`控件中删除中的选定的项对象，因此从控件。The event handler of the `Button1` control deletes the selected item from the object and therefore from the control.
